<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
  var $tocItems = $(".tocify-subheader li.tocify-item"); // selector for all TOC items
  var $tabs     = $("a[role=\"tab\"]");                  // selector for all tabs
  var $panels   = $("div[role=\"tabpanel\"]");           // selector for all tabpanels

  $tocItems.hide();  // hide all TOC items

  // get the tab name for each section header (e.g. mammals)
  // and assign it to its corresponding toc item
  $panels.find("div[data-unique]").each(function() {
    var key = $(this).attr("data-unique");
    var tab = $(this).closest("div[role=\"tabpanel\"]").attr("id");
    $tocItems.filter("[data-unique=\"" + key + "\"]").attr("tab", tab)
  })
  // now each toc item knows to which tab panel it is pointing

  // show the toc items that point to sections on the first panel
  $tocItems.filter(function() {
    return($(this).attr("tab") === $tabs.first().text());
  }).toggle();

  // assign an onclick event to the tabs..
  $tabs.on("click", function() {
    $tocItems.hide();  // ... hide all TOC items
    var key = $(this).text(); // ... get the name of the tab clicked
    $tocItems.filter(function() {  // ... filter for the toc items pointing to that tab
      return($(this).attr("tab") === key);
    }).toggle();  // ... and show them
  });  
});
</script>

```{r data, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
pm_implicitQttyTarget <- mip::getPlotData("pm_implicitQttyTarget", params$gdx)

p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent <- mip::getPlotData("p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent", params$gdx)

p47_implicitQttyTargetTax <- mip::getPlotData("p47_implicitQttyTargetTax", params$gdx)

tgts <- pm_implicitQttyTarget %>% select(ext_regi,ttot,qttyTarget,qttyTarget,qttyTargetGroup) %>% mutate_at(c('ttot'), as.numeric) %>% mutate(group = paste0(qttyTarget, " ", qttyTargetGroup, " - ", ttot))

regi <- gdx::readGDX(params$gdx,"regi")
```

<!-- quantities and taxes -->
```{r qttyAndTax chart, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}

#Convert regi to ext_regi and vice-versa
convGroupExt <- NULL
for(tgtReg in unique(tgts$ext_regi)){
  if(tgtReg %in% regi)
    convGroupExt <- c(convGroupExt,setNames(tgtReg,tgtReg))
  else
    convGroupExt <- c(convGroupExt, setNames(regi_groupExt %>% filter(ext_regi == tgtReg, !(all_regi %in% tgtReg)) %>% slice(1) %>% pull(all_regi), tgtReg))
}

TWa_2_EJ     <- 31.536
tdptwyr2dpgj <- 31.71

plotData <-
  #left_join(
    left_join(
      left_join(
        left_join(
          p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter %>%
            mutate(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter = p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter*TWa_2_EJ),
          p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter %>%
            filter(all_regi %in% convGroupExt) %>%
            mutate(ext_regi = setNames(names(convGroupExt), convGroupExt)[all_regi],
                   p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter = p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter*tdptwyr2dpgj) %>%
            select(-all_regi),
          by = c("iteration","ttot","ext_regi", "qttyTarget", "qttyTargetGroup")
          ),
        p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter,
        by = c("iteration","ttot","ext_regi", "qttyTarget", "qttyTargetGroup")
        ),
      p47_implicitQttyTargetTaxRescale_iter,
      by = c("iteration","ttot","ext_regi", "qttyTarget", "qttyTargetGroup")
      #),
    #pm_implicitQttyTarget_isLimited,
    #by = c("iteration","ttot","ext_regi", "qttyTarget", "qttyTargetGroup")
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    target = paste0(qttyTarget, " ", qttyTargetGroup),
    tooltip = paste0(
    "Iteration : ", iteration,"<br>",
    "Quantity : ", round(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter,2), " EJ<br>",
    "Tax : ", round(p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter,2), " US$2005/GJ<br>",
    "Convergence : ",
      ifelse(is.na(p47_implicitQttyTargetTaxRescale_iter),
      "not active",       
      ifelse((p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter <= cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance) & (p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter >= -cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance),
        "converged",
        paste0("not converged<br>",
               "Deviation: ", round(100*p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter,2), "%", 
                    ifelse(cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance >= 0, " > ", " < -"), round(100*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance,2), "%<br>",
                 "Rescale for next iteration: ", round(p47_implicitQttyTargetTaxRescale_iter,2))
        )
    ))
    )


g[["qtty_and_tax"]] <-
  lapply(setNames(tgtRegions, tgtRegions), function(reg){
    subGroup <- setNames(tgts %>% filter(ext_regi == reg) %>% pull(ttot), tgts %>% filter(ext_regi == reg) %>% pull(group))
    lapply(subGroup, function(tgtPeriod){
      
      d <- plotData %>% filter(ext_regi == reg, ttot == tgtPeriod)
      secAxisScale <- max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter)) / max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))  
      
      yAxisLabel <- unique(d$target)
      
      p <- plot_ly(data = d, height = 350) %>% #
        add_trace(x = ~iteration, y = ~p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter, name = yAxisLabel, mode = "lines", type = "scatter", line=list(color = qttyTaxColor["qtty"]),hoverinfo="none", hoverinfo='skip') %>% 
        add_trace(x = ~iteration, y = ~p47_implicitQttyTargetTax_iter, name = "Price", yaxis = "y2", mode = "lines", type = "scatter", line=list(color = qttyTaxColor["price"]), hoverinfo="none",hoverinfo='skip') %>%
       # add trace only for hover info (hack to disable line in hovermode = "x unified"
        add_trace(x = ~iteration, y = ~p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter, mode = "lines", type = "scatter", hoverinfo = "text", line = list(width = 0),
              hovertext = d$tooltip) %>%
        layout(
          #template = 'plotly_white',
          hovermode = "x unified",
          showlegend = FALSE,
          margin = list(r = 60),
          xaxis = list(
            zeroline=FALSE,
            #zeroline=TRUE,
            #zerolinecolor = "#e8e8e8", zerolinewidth = 2, 
            range = c(0.5,max(d$iteration)+0.5),
            title = "Iterations",
            gridcolor = "#e8e8e8",
            mirror=TRUE, ticks='outside', showline=TRUE, linecolor="#adadad", linewidth = 2#, tickcolor = "#e8e8e8", tickwidth = 3
          ),
          yaxis = list(
            zeroline=TRUE, zerolinecolor = "#e8e8e8", zerolinewidth = 3, 
            title=list(text=paste0(yAxisLabel, " (EJ)"),font=list(color=qttyTaxColor["qtty"])),
            range = c(min(0,min(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter)) - max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))*0.05), max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))*1.05),
            gridcolor = "#e8e8e8",
            ticks='outside', showline=TRUE, linecolor="#adadad", linewidth = 2#, tickcolor = "#e8e8e8", tickwidth = 3
            ),
          yaxis2 = list(
            zeroline=TRUE, zerolinecolor = "#e8e8e8", zerolinewidth = 3, 
            showgrid = FALSE,
            title=list(text="Tax (US$2005/GJ)",font=list(color=qttyTaxColor["price"])),
            overlaying = "y",
            side = "right",
            range = c(min(0,min(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))*secAxisScale - max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))*secAxisScale*0.05), max(d %>% pull(p47_implicitQttyTargetCurrent_iter))*secAxisScale*1.05),
            ticks='outside', showline=TRUE, linecolor="#adadad", linewidth = 2#, tickcolor = "#e8e8e8", tickwidth = 3
            )
           #,autosize = FALSE
          )
  
      
    })
  })
```

```{r deviation chart, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}


# deviation chart
plotData <- p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter %>%
  mutate(converged = ifelse((.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter <=  cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance) & (.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter >= -cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance), "yes", "no"),
         tooltip = paste0("Iteration: ", .data$iteration, "<br>",
                          ifelse((.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter <=  cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance) & (.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter >= -cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance),
                                 paste0("Converged<br>",
                                   "Deviation: ", round(100*.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter,2), "%"),      
                                 paste0("Not converged<br>",
                                  "Deviation: ", round(100*.data$p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter,2), "%", ifelse(p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter >= 0, " > ", " < -"), round(100*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance,2),"%"))
         )
  )

g[["deviation"]] <- 
  lapply(setNames(tgtRegions, tgtRegions), function(reg){
    subGroup <- setNames(tgts %>% filter(ext_regi == reg) %>% pull(ttot), tgts %>% filter(ext_regi == reg) %>% pull(group))
    lapply(subGroup, function(tgtPeriod){
      d <- plotData %>% filter(ext_regi == reg, ttot == tgtPeriod)
      p <- ggplot(d, aes_string(x = "iteration", y = "p47_implicitQttyTarget_dev_iter")) +
        suppressWarnings(geom_rect(aes(xmin = .data$iteration - 0.5, xmax = .data$iteration + 0.5,ymin = cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance * -1,ymax = cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance, fill = converged, text = tooltip), alpha = 0.2)) +
        suppressWarnings(geom_line(aes_string(group = 1, text = "tooltip"))) +
        scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(-5*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance, -cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance, 0, cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance, 5*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance), labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 1)) +
        scale_fill_manual(values = booleanColor) +
        theme_bw() +
        theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
              axis.title.x=element_blank(),
              legend.position = "none") + 
        coord_cartesian(ylim=c(-5*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance, +5*cm_implicitQttyTarget_tolerance)) +
        ylab("Deviation (%)") +
        scale_x_continuous(expand=c(0,0),breaks=1:max(d$iteration)) +
        #xlim(0,max(d$iteration)+1) +
        theme(plot.margin = margin(0,42,0,22, "pt")) # t,r,b,l
        
      plotly::ggplotly(p, tooltip = c("text"), height = 200) #, autosize = FALSE
    })
  })
```

# Creating sections
out <- ""
for(reg in tgtRegions){
  out <- paste0(out,knitr::knit_expand(text=paste0("### ", reg, " {.tabset}\n\n")))
  for(subGroup in tgts %>% filter(ext_regi == reg) %>% pull(group)){
    
    tgtPeriod <- strsplit(subGroup,"_",fixed=T)[[1]][1]
    
    out <- paste0(out,knitr::knit_expand(text=paste0("#### ", subGroup, "\n\n")))
    
    out <- paste0(out,knitr::knit_expand(text=paste0("##### Quantity and Tax\n\n")))
    out <- paste0(out,"```{r , results = 'asis', fig.height=10}\n\n")
    out <- paste0(out,"g$qtty_and_tax[['", reg, "']][['", subGroup, "']]\n\n")
    out <- paste0(out,"```\n\n")
    
#    out <- paste0(out,knitr::knit_expand(text=paste0("##### Deviation per iteration\n\n")))
    out <- paste0(out,"```{r , results = 'asis', fig.height=10}\n\n")
    out <- paste0(out,"g$deviation[['", reg, "']][['", subGroup, "']]\n\n")
    out <- paste0(out,"```\n\n")
  }
}
